allBanks.name: All Banks
allBanks.desc: All the banks that will be used by the game. One bank path per line.

preloadBanks.name: Preload Banks
preloadBanks.desc: The banks that will be preloaded. One bank path per line.

preloadBanksNonBlocking.name: Load Banks (Non Blocking)
preloadBanksNonBlocking.desc: The banks that will be loaded as soon as possible but will not prevent the game from starting. One bank path per line.

preloadSampleData.name: Load Sample Data
preloadSampleData.desc: Banks for which to load sample data. One bank path per line. This can increase loading time but improves initial playback. Do not include banks with streamed assets.

autoSuspend.name: Auto Suspend
autoSuspend.desc: Automatically suspend FMOD when the game is suspended. Disable this if you want to control the suspend state manually.

dspBufferSize.name: DSP Buffer Size
dspBufferSize.desc: The DSP buffer size in samples. A larger buffer size can reduce CPU usage but increases latency.

dspBufferCount.name: DSP Buffer Count
dspBufferCount.desc: The number of DSP buffers. More buffers can reduce audio dropouts but increases latency.

maxChannels.name: Max Channels
maxChannels.desc: The maximum number of channels that can be played simultaneously.

initialMemory.name: Initial Memory
initialMemory.desc: The initial memory pool size for FMOD in megabytes.

advancedSettings.name: Advanced Settings
advancedSettings.desc: Advanced settings for FMOD. See the FMOD documentation for more information.

loadSampleData.name: Load Sample Data
loadSampleData.desc: Whether to load sample data for the bank

LoadBankSampleData.description: Load sample data for the specified FMOD bank.

UnloadBankSampleData.description: Unload sample data for the specified FMOD bank.

SetBusMuted.description: Set the muted state of the specified FMOD bus.

muted.name: Muted
muted.desc: The muted state of the bus

SetBusPaused.description: Set the paused state of the specified FMOD bus.

paused.name: Paused
paused.desc: The paused state of the bus

SetBusVolume.description: Set the volume of the specified FMOD bus.

StopAllBusEvents.display-text: Stop all events from bus [i]{0}[/i] with fade out: [i]{1}[/i]
StopAllBusEvents.description: Stop all events of the specified FMOD bus.

allowFadeOut.name: Allow Fade Out
allowFadeOut.desc: Allow fade out for the events

InstantiateEvent.description: Instantiate the specified FMOD event. This doesn't start it. Use this when you need to change the event parameters before starting it.

LoadEventSampleData.description: Load sample data for the specified FMOD event.

ReleaseEventInstance.description: Release the specified FMOD event instance.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

SetEventPaused.description: Set the paused state of the specified FMOD event.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

paused.name: Paused
paused.desc: The paused state of the event instance

SetEventTimelinePosition.display-text: Set event [i]{0}[/i] with tag [i]{1}[/i] timeline position to: [i]{2}[/i]
SetEventTimelinePosition.description: Set the paused state of the specified FMOD event.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

timelinePosition.name: Timeline Position
timelinePosition.desc: The timeline position of the event instance

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

destroyWhenStopped.name: Release
destroyWhenStopped.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag on the next tick

StartEventAtObject.display-text: Start event [i]{0}[/i] with tag [i]{1}[/i] at object [i]{2}[/i] at image point [i]{3}[/i] (destroy: [i]{4}[/i], forward mode: [i]{5}[/i], auto update: [i]{6}[/i], auto velocity: [i]{7}[/i], auto destroy: [i]{8}[/i], allow fade out: [i]{9}[/i])
StartEventAtObject.description: Start the specified FMOD event at the specified object.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

object.name: Object
object.desc: The object to start the event at

imagePoint.name: Image Point
imagePoint.desc: The image point to start the event at

destroyWhenStopped.name: Release
destroyWhenStopped.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag on the next tick

forwardMode.name: Forward Mode
forwardMode.desc: The mode to determine the forward vector (Camera or Angle)

autoUpdate.name: Auto Update
autoUpdate.desc: Automatically update the event's position and orientation with the object

autoVelocity.name: Auto Velocity
autoVelocity.desc: Automatically update the event's velocity with the object

autoDestroy.name: Auto Destroy
autoDestroy.desc: Automatically stop and destroy the event when the object is destroyed

allowFadeOut.name: Allow Fade Out
allowFadeOut.desc: Allow the event to fade out when stopped

StartOneTimeEvent.description: Start the specified FMOD event as a one-time event. This instance will be released immediately.

StopAllEventInstances.display-text: Stop all [i]{0}[/i] events (allow fade out: [i]{1}[/i], release: [i]{2}[/i])
StopAllEventInstances.description: Stop all FMOD event instances from one specific event.

allowFadeOut.name: Allow fade out
allowFadeOut.desc: Allow fade out for the events

release.name: Release
release.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag.

allowFadeOut.name: Allow fade out
allowFadeOut.desc: Allow fade out for the events

release.name: Release
release.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag.

StopEventInstance.display-text: Stop event [i]{0}[/i] with tag [i]{1}[/i] (allow fade out: [i]{2}[/i], release: [i]{3}[/i])
StopEventInstance.description: Stop the specified FMOD event, with an option to allow fade out.

allowFadeOut.name: Allow fade out
allowFadeOut.desc: Allow fade out for the events

release.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag.

SetAutoSuspend.description: Set the auto suspend state of FMOD.

SetSuspended.description: Set the suspended state of FMOD.

SetListener3DAttributes.description: Set the 3D attributes of the specified FMOD listener.

hasSeparateAttenuationPosition.name: Has separate attenuation position
hasSeparateAttenuationPosition.desc: Whether to use separate attenuation position

SetListener3DAttributesFromCamera.display-text: Set listener [i]{0}[/i] 3D attributes from camera [i]{1}[/i]: velocity: ([i]{2}[/i], [i]{3}[/i], [i]{4}[/i]), attenuation? ([i]{5}[/i]) : ([i]{6}[/i], [i]{7}[/i], [i]{8}[/i])
SetListener3DAttributesFromCamera.description: Set the 3D attributes of the specified FMOD listener from the specified camera.

camera.name: Camera
camera.desc: The Camera3D object to get position and orientation from

velocity-x.name: Velocity X
velocity-x.desc: X component of the listener's velocity vector

velocity-y.name: Velocity Y
velocity-y.desc: Y component of the listener's velocity vector

velocity-z.name: Velocity Z
velocity-z.desc: Z component of the listener's velocity vector

hasSeparateAttenuationPosition.name: Has separate attenuation position
hasSeparateAttenuationPosition.desc: Whether to use a separate position for distance attenuation

attenuation-x.name: Attenuation X
attenuation-x.desc: X component of the attenuation position

attenuation-y.name: Attenuation Y
attenuation-y.desc: Y component of the attenuation position

attenuation-z.name: Attenuation Z
attenuation-z.desc: Z component of the attenuation position

SetListener3DAttributesFromScrollPositio.display-text: Set listener [i]{0}[/i] 3D attributes from scroll position: velocity: ([i]{1}[/i], [i]{2}[/i]), attenuation? ([i]{3}[/i]) : ([i]{4}[/i], [i]{5}[/i])
SetListener3DAttributesFromScrollPositio.description: Set the 3D attributes of the specified FMOD listener from the scroll position.

velocity-x.desc: X component of the listener's velocity vector

velocity-y.name: Velocity Y
velocity-y.desc: Y component of the listener's velocity vector

hasSeparateAttenuationPosition.desc: Whether to use a separate position for distance attenuation

attenuation-x.name: Attenuation X
attenuation-x.desc: X component of the attenuation position

attenuation-y.name: Attenuation Y

SetListenerSimpleAttributesFromScrollPos.description: Set the simple attributes of the specified FMOD listener from the scroll position.

SetListenerWeight.description: Set the weight of the specified FMOD listener.

SetNbListeners.description: Set the number of FMOD listeners.

nb.name: Nb
nb.desc: A number of listeners, from 1 to 8

SetEventParameter.display-text: Set event parameter [i]{2}[/i] on event [i]{0}[/i] with tags [i]{1}[/i] to [i]{4}[/i] (ignore seek speed: [i]{5}[/i], use Id: [i]{3}[/i])
SetEventParameter.description: Set a parameter value for the specified FMOD event.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

parameter.name: Parameter
parameter.desc: The name or ID of the parameter

isid.name: Use Id
isid.desc: Whether the parameter is specified by its ID instead of its name

value.name: Value
value.desc: The value to set the parameter to

ignoreSeekSpeed.name: Ignore seek speed
ignoreSeekSpeed.desc: Whether to ignore the parameter's seek speed and set the value immediately

SetEventParameterWithLabel.display-text: Set event parameter [i]{2}[/i] on event [i]{0}[/i] with tags [i]{1}[/i] to label [i]{4}[/i] (ignore seek speed: [i]{5}[/i], use Id: [i]{3}[/i])
SetEventParameterWithLabel.description: Set a parameter value for the specified FMOD event, using the parameter label instead of the parameter name.

isid.desc: Whether the parameter is specified by its ID instead of its name

value.name: Value
value.desc: The label value to set the parameter to

ignoreSeekSpeed.name: Ignore seek speed
ignoreSeekSpeed.desc: Whether to ignore the parameter's seek speed and set the value immediately

SetGlobalParameter.display-text: Set global parameter [i]{0}[/i] to [i]{2}[/i] (ignore seek speed: [i]{3}[/i], use Id: [i]{1}[/i])

ignoreSeekSpeed.name: Ignore seek speed
ignoreSeekSpeed.desc: Whether to ignore the parameter's seek speed and set the value immediately
